price: Elif Lām Rā. [1]  Ovo su ajeti knjige, Kur’ana jasnog!
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: [1] Pogledati značenje spomenuto prilikom tumačenja prvog ajeta sure El-Bekare.

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
